data.title: Reasons for US failure in defeating the Vietcong
data.meta_description: Learn how the USA was unable to defeat the Vietcong and about American opposition to the war. BBC Bitesize Scotland National 5 History guide to the Cold War
data.text:
National 5

The Vietnam WarReasons for US failure in defeating the Vietcong

The USA became involved in Vietnam because it feared the spread of communism. The USA were unable to defeat the Vietcong and were met with growing opposition to the war back home.

Part of
